articles.author: Holly Yan
articles.title: Human Rights Campaign declares a national state of emergency for LGBTQ+ people - CNN
articles.description: For the first time in its four-decade history, America’s largest lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and queer civil rights organization has declared a national state of emergency for members of the LGBTQ+ community, the Human Rights Campaign said Tuesday.
